======Sets all spawners to infinite.======

= Description =

Forces ALL spawners to be infinite. I don't recommend enabling this unless you have fairly small pruning settings and you have <!--[asw_carnage_min_interval]-->[[asw_carnage_min_interval.wiki|asw_carnage_min_interval]] set to a fairly high amount.
